sentences.english: Xiaogan City locates in the northeast of Hubei province, belonging to Chu dialect area.
sentences.chinese: 孝感市位于湖北省东北部，属楚语区。

sentences.english: Xiaogan, with fertile soil and numerous lakes, is a crucial production base of grain, cotton and oil.
sentences.chinese: 孝感土地肥沃，湖泊众多，是重要粮棉油生产基地。

sentences.english: Xiaogan Chinese medicine Pharmaceutical society Director Unit.
sentences.chinese: 孝感市中医药学会理事单位。

sentences.english: Four of them were Xiaogan technological progress award.
sentences.chinese: 其中四项获孝感市科技进步奖。
